body.name: Marvel Titan Hero Series Guardians of The Galaxy Vol. 3 Deluxe Blast 'N Battle Groot Action Figure, 11.5-Inch with Accessories
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 4 mins
features: BLAST 'N BATTLE GROOT: As he matures with more advanced skills, Groot helps build Knowhere and protects his fellow Guardians

DELUXE ARTICULATED ACTION FIGURE: This 11.5-inch-scale Groot action figure is part of the Titan Hero Series and features 5 points of articulation so kids 4 and up can pose figure for every Super Hero adventure they imagine
DETACHABLE ACCESSORIES: Blast 'N Battle Groot Marvel toy includes removable wings and root arms
ARM WITH BLASTER: Groot's room arm features 2 blasters with an included projectile for even more fun action play

ENTERTAINMENT-INSPIRED DESIGN: Blast 'N Battle Groot is designed and inspired by Marvel Studios' Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3. Look out for more exclusive Marvel role play toys and action figures. (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.)
body.description: Kids ages 4 and up can gear up this Blast 'N Battle Groot deluxe action figure to overcome every pretend battle in the galaxy! Inspired by Marvel Studios' Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3, this Super Hero toy features an entertainment-inspired design and detachable accessories. Groot figure includes detachable wings, root arms, and 2 blaster weapon accessories complete with a projectile. Kids will love playing as Groot and imagine fighting off bad guys! Blast 'N Battle Groot makes a great gift for kids and adult fans alike. Look out for more Marvel role play toys and action figures! (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.) Copyright 2023 MARVEL. © 2023 Hasbro. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Toddler loves Groot and has been wanting this specific one since our vacation where he spotted it at the airport. They wanted $50 for it and I quickly went on Amazon and found it for way less than that. I was very happy to save money and make him happy on Christmas with this Groot he so badly wanted. Great quality came with different accessories. Doesn’t talk but he didn’t mind that. He really wanted this version of Groot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son has exclusively been playing with action figures over thr last few months. He saw this one and was asking for it repeatedly. It has now become his favorite. The figure has little shooters that actually launch small items out of them. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My little Groot loved this toy!
reviews.reviewText: This toy goes above and beyond your basic Groot toys in the store! My little Groot loved all of the additional piece that can be played with this set. Not to mention how nice and professional this set is shipped and boxed. Makes it feel very luxurious unboxing. This is a quality toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is as described. Product came undamaged in box. All parts are present and functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves it
reviews.reviewText: Quality toy, my son loves it, love the box the toy came in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Groot is perfect to add to the collection. Comes with a bunch of cool accessories! Easy to put together and very fun to play with. Good quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It was not his favorite toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Me gusta el diseño. Me gustan las articulaciones porque tienen buen movimiento y no se rompen con el uso normal. Amo su empaque libre de plástico, en mi opinion, lo que HASBRO ahorra sirve para mejorar la calidad del juguete. Antes las figuras de esta linea tenian una calidad muy baja, se rompian de las manos con facilidad, tenian movimiento muy limitado, rebabas, partes despegadas, etc.
Era un regalopara mi primo pequeño. Se quedó contentísimo
Esta muy bueno por su precio

Esta figura Blast'N'Battle de Groot es super chula y junto con las otras figuras Titan Series de Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 seguro que proporcionarán muchas aventuras entretenidas o bien completará tu colección de la mejor manera posible.La figura mide 11,5" de alto y se mantiene en pie por sí sola. Es verdaderamente estable y fácil de manipular para jugar. La articulación de la cadera permite que podamos sentarla. Los hombros permiten que los brazos se separen un poco del cuerpo pero hasta unos 45 grados. Las muñecas simplemente rotan y en los pies no hay articulación. El rostro es muy bonito y tiene mucho detalle. La cabeza puede girar a ambos lados y elevarse ligeramente.Las alas se encajan en la parte superior de la espalda y la verdad es que para colocarlas la primera vez hay que hacer mucha fuerza. La pieza que va colocada en el pecho se compone de unas raíces donde van montados dos cañones con proyectiles que se pueden lanzar presionando un botón.Me ha resultado llamativo el hecho de que la figura viene en una caja de cartón sin que se vea nada del interior y me gusta el hecho de que hayan reducido el uso de plásticos en todo el conjunto.Su precio es quizá algo elevado si tenemos en cuenta de que no tiene luz ni sonidos, aunque se nota que es una figura muy bien hecha y que incluso se nota "pesada" en las manos, de buena calidad.Además trae las armas y en realidad estos accesorios hacen que se vea más completa y que destaque, y sobre todo, es más entretenida tanto para montar como para jugar.Desde luego, a los fans de Groot les va a gustar sí o sí.
